name: Dead Centre
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/KtgGTvnWR7TnAzCg7

A sudden pandemic has spread throughout the world at an alarming rate. Most of the population has turned into a zombie within a few minutes. You must now arm yourself and fight through a horde of zombies to find other survivors! CAN YOU SURVIVE AND MAKE IT OUT OF THE FACILITY?
